description:
《英乐天天唱》是一档模仿唱歌类节目，目的在于提升大家的英语口语能力。主持人会在每期节目中选取好听的歌曲片段，并给出发音提示和模仿示例。喜欢听音乐的童鞋可要积极参与哦！去沪江部落订阅本节目！

'Halo'与'Sasha Fierce'碟中的'Diva'作为"I Am...Sasha Fierce"的第二波主打单曲一起发行单曲，取得优异成绩，美国Billboard Hot 100排名最高第5，澳大利亚、、希腊、法国、爱尔兰、意大利、巴西、加拿大、英国、德国等世界多国前十，取得挪威、斯洛伐克、巴西冠军，更是巴西2000-2009十年之声冠军。"Halo"赢得一项2009欧洲MTV音乐大奖：最佳歌曲（Best Song）,还在第52届格莱美奖上为Beyonce赢得一项大奖：最佳流行女歌手，连同其它奖项，Beyonce在同一届格莱美上一共获得6项大奖，与Adele并列为女歌手之最。

'Halo'是'I am Sasha Fierce'专辑的第四波单曲。这首歌是由Ryan Tedder 和 Evan Bogart共同制作和创作。这首原本是Ryan Tedder和Evan Bogart推荐给Lewis唱的，只不过，Lewis并没有时间录音。由于Ryan Tedder想要把这首歌快点推出，所以就转让给Beyonce。

Remember those walls I built
Well baby they're tumbling down
And they didn't even put up a fight
They didn't even make a sound
I found a way to let you in
But I never really had a doubt
Standing in the light of your halo
I got my angel now

It's like I've been awakened
Every rule I had you breakin'
It's the risk that I'm takin'
I ain't never gonna shut you out

Everywhere I'm looking now
I'm surrounded by your embrace
Baby I can see your halo
You know you're my saving grace
You're everything I need and more
It's written all over your face
Baby I can feel your halo
Pray it won't fade away

I can feel your halo (halo) halo
I can see your halo (halo) halo
I can feel your halo (halo) halo
I can see your halo (halo) halo
Woah...

Hit me like a ray of sun
Burning through my darkest night
You're the only one that I want
Think I'm addicted to your light
I swore I'd never fall again
But this don't even feel like falling
Gravity can't forget
To pull me back to the ground again

讲解：

模唱：

title: 英文歌曲天天唱：Halo

description:
But first he's been cleared of all charges. Dominique Strauss-Kahn, the former head of the International Monetary Fund, has walked free from a French court, not guilty of procuring prostitutes for parties. The former politician, who was once a French presidential front runner, had been accused of aggravated pimping for orgies in France and the United States. He'd always denied knowing the women were paid. The judge said Mr Strauss-Kahn had acted more as a client than an instigator. The verdict brings to an end four years of legal proceedings against Mr Strauss-Kahn which included accusations of sexual assault by a New York hotel maid in 2011. I spoke to Fran Blandy, reporter from Agence France-Presse who's been following the trial.

Today's verdict really is the end of quite a long line of different judicial woes that Dominique Strauss-Kahn has had to face. Strauss-Kahn, when we last heard of him, was just recovering from the scandal in New York where a hotel maid accused him of sexual assault. Those charges were dropped and that was settled in a civil suit. And then not long afterwards, police were investigating a prostitution ring in the north of France where people were accused of organising prostitutes for lunchtime sex parties with policemen, well connected businessmen.

description:
《标准美音模仿秀》是一档沪江社团的原创口语互动节目（戳我去参加社刊>>），主持人截取30秒左右的英语音频，然后对音频进行重点讲解和示范模仿，并对大家递交的口语模仿作品进行一对一的点评，想要练习纯正美音的童鞋赶快行动起来吧！去沪江社团订阅本社刊！

今日主持人：amiaoooo

模仿文本： Rice University professor Bill Arnold just returned from his latest fishing trip to Alaska, where he captured photos of unspoiled nature.莱斯大学教授比尔·阿诺德刚从阿拉斯加垂钓旅行回来。在那里，他拍了很多未经破坏的大自然的照片。
